content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in vilnius city district court the court has reached a final resolution in a matrimonial property case the immovable property will be divided between the parties as well as the credit agreement obligations the awarded applicant will receive a vehicle the court has established the dissolution of the marriage and the obligations that come with it the bank leasing agreement has been fulfilled granting the applicant the right to use the vehicle once all obligations are fulfilled the applicant will acquire personal ownership of the vehicle the applicant referred to as rr has brought a court action requesting the dissolution of their marriage with the defendant referred to as zr the applicant also seeks to establish their residence as the place for their minor child and requests child support the applicant wants to determine access arrangements for the defendant to see the child and resolve property and credit obligation issues the applicant also wants to retain their surname from before the marriage and requests that the defendant pay the costs of the proceedings the defendant accepts the claims made by the applicant during the hearing the state child rights protection adoption service supports the applicants request for the childs residence and suggests specific contact arrangements the court must determine the division of the couples joint and separate property taking into account any creditors rights the court has ordered the defendant to pay temporary maintenance for the minor child and the applicants legal costs the defendant must also pay stamp duty and the costs of serving procedural documents to the state budget
